org.team5940.robot_core.modules.ownable

Class SimpleOwnableModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.team5940.robot_core.modules.SimpleModule
      • org.team5940.robot_core.modules.ownable.SimpleOwnableModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module, OwnableModule
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoubleSolenoidPistonModule, DoubleSolenoidShifterModule

    public abstract class SimpleOwnableModule
extends SimpleModule
implements OwnableModule
    This extension of Module provides the interface to lock access to a Module to a particular Thread. This is useful in preventing unintentional concurrent usage, particularly of actuators.

      • Fields inherited from class org.team5940.robot_core.modules.SimpleModule

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean acquireOwnershipFor(java.lang.Thread t, boolean force)
      Attempts to acquire ownership of this by t if: (no Thread currently owns this or it died, or force == true), and t doesn't already own this.
      boolean isOwnedBy(java.lang.Thread t)
      This method determines whether this is currently owned by Thread t.
      void relinquishOwnershipFor(java.lang.Thread t)
      Attempts to relinquish ownership of this by t if t currently owns this and hasn't died.

    • Method Detail

      • isOwnedBy

        public boolean isOwnedBy(java.lang.Thread t)
        Description copied from interface: OwnableModule
        This method determines whether this is currently owned by Thread t. Should return true if t == null and this is not owned or the owner died.
        Specified by:
        isOwnedBy in interface OwnableModule
        Parameters:
        t - The Thread to check ownership for.
        Returns:
        true if t == the Thread that owns this and t has not died (or t == null and this is not owned or is owned by a dead Thread), false otherwise.

      • acquireOwnershipFor

        public boolean acquireOwnershipFor(java.lang.Thread t,
                                   boolean force)
        Description copied from interface: OwnableModule
        Attempts to acquire ownership of this by t if: (no Thread currently owns this or it died, or force == true), and t doesn't already own this. Returns the results of this.isOwnedBy(t). Note: t can be null if you are attempting to force ownership relinquishing.
        Specified by:
        acquireOwnershipFor in interface OwnableModule
        Parameters:
        t - The Thread to acquire ownership for.
        force - Whether to force the ownership of this by t.
        Returns:
        true if t owns this, false otherwise.

      • relinquishOwnershipFor

        public void relinquishOwnershipFor(java.lang.Thread t)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: OwnableModule
        Attempts to relinquish ownership of this by t if t currently owns this and hasn't died.
        Specified by:
        relinquishOwnershipFor in interface OwnableModule
        Parameters:
        t - The Thread to acquire ownership for.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If t == null. To force relinquishing for any Thread, call aquireOwnershipFor(null, true);
